examples.example: 如果每个人都能保持乐观积极的心态，那我们的世界将会变得更加美好。

translate.english: If everyone can maintain an optimistic and positive attitude, then our world will become even more beautiful.

examples.example: 如果我们心怀希望勇敢前行，就一定能收获美好的未来。

translate.english: If we move forward bravely with hope in our hearts, we will surely be able to reap a beautiful future.

examples.example: 如果我们一直努力奋斗，就一定会取得优异的成绩。

translate.english: If we keep working hard all the time, we will surely achieve excellent results.
